section.title: Additional Open Source libraries
section.para: Sometimes having to press a refresh button on the ActionBar to refresh data can be annoying for the user. Chris Banes has implemented an Open Source library to implement the pull to refresh pattern for a Listview . https://github.com/chrisbanes/Android-PullToRefresh.

Also you may want to use the swipe to dismiss gesture to delete items from a ListView. Roman Nurik provides an example for this at Android swipe-to-dismiss library which Jake Wharton backported to earlier Android releases at SwipeToDismissNOA.
